remarks: A way to represent ordered pairs using unordered pairs with distinct members.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Mar-2007.)
statement:
preq12b.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
preq12b.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
preq12b.3 $e |- C e. _V $.
preq12b.4 $e |- D e. _V $.
opthpr $p |- ( A =/= D -> ( { A , B } = { C , D } <-> ( A = C /\ B = D ) ) ) $.
